name: Wanna smoke?
description:
My first game which is about some guy  smoking weed and everything goes really well...or is it? Well.. his friends don't like to smoke with "some guy" because they say say he's really really...odd, but he convinced his 3 friends to smoke, just one joint.

If you are maybe suspicious don't be . This game is cute, sweet, calming and with fun music. And of course no one got ki....
